title: Zorin OS 17 Beta Released with Quick Settings, Spatial Desktop, and More
description:
Zorin OS 17 is now available for public beta testing with Quick Settings, enhanced multitasking experience, advanced window tiling, and numerous other improvements.

The post Zorin OS 17 Beta Released with Quick Settings, Spatial Desktop, and More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
